title: Messi to join Inter Miami, club confirms
description: Lionel Messi will be signed by Inter Miami CF, the club has announced today.

title: 'Italy no longer has four seasons': Intense heatwave grips the country
description: In Italy today, the number of cities on red alert for extreme heat has climbed from 10 to 15.

title: Minefields and target practice: What life in recaptured Ukrainian territory is really like
description: In a moment of candour, the Ukrainian president, Volodymyr Zelensky said the counter-offensive has not gone exactly as planned.

title: Drought parches nearly half of EU land stoking food production fears
description: Almost half of European Union territory has slipped into a "severe" drought, the bloc's official body has warned, bringing a risk of fire over "most of Europe" and fears for food production.

title: Netanyahu taken to hospital 'feeling unwell'
description: Benjamin Netanyahu is in hospital, his office has confirmed.

title: At least seven dead after flooding and landslides in South Korea
description: At least seven people have died after torrential downpours triggered deadly flash floods and landslides in South Korea.

title: Hong Kongers urged to stare at smokers in a disapproving way to help create a tobacco-free city
description: People in Hong Kong should stare at smokers disapprovingly as part of efforts to create a tobacco-free city, the territory's health minister has said.
